tut.trans: Kamu dapat membeli buff global di sini
tut.eng: You can purchase global buff items here

tut.trans: Jika kamu menyukai game ini, silakan donasi :)
tut.eng: If you liked the game, please consider donation :)

tut.trans: Kamu dapat menggunakan Cache untuk mencetak equipment yang baru di sini
tut.eng: You can use your Cache to print new equipment here

tut.trans:
Untuk melanjutkan ke area selanjutnya, kamu membutuhkan Secret Key Fragments dari dungeon, 
        dan gunakan Terminal untuk Brute Force untuk mendapatkan kunci ke area selanjutnya
tut.eng:
To progress to next area, you need to use get Secret Key Fragments from dungeons, 
        and use Terminal to Brute Force the key for next area

description.trans:
[Central Hub]
        Salah satu kota tersibuk di benua ini, di sini kamu dapat menemukan segala jenis orang dari berbagai belahan dunia.
description.eng:
[Central Hub]
        One of the busiest cities in the continent, here you can find all sorts of people from around the globe.

name.trans: Pergi ke Hyper Train Central Station
name.eng: Go to Hyper Train Central Station

tut.trans: mulai petualangan kamu dengan epic loot di sini
tut.eng: Start your adventure to epic loots here

description.trans: Pergi ke Hyper Train Central Station
description.eng: Go to Hyper Train Central Station

tut.trans: Kamu dapat menyelesaikan AFK jobs untuk menaikkan skill kamu di sini
tut.eng: You can complete AFK jobs to increase your skills here

tut.trans: Anda dapat menjual atau membeli item dari pemain lain di sini
tut.eng: You can sell or buy items from other players here

description.trans:
[Job Hub]
        Banyak toko dan tempat bisnis di sini, lokasi yang cocok untuk mencoba skill kamu.
description.eng:
[Job Hub]
        Many shops and Businesses, a perfect location to try out your skills.

description.trans:
[Player Market]
        Market Street yang sangat terkenal di Shangri-La. banyak lapak penjual di sini.
        mungkin kamu dapat menemukan yang kamu cari atau membuka lapak sendiri.
description.eng:
[Player Market]
        The famous market street in Shangri-La. Loads of market stalls fill the street.
        Maybe you can find something you need or set up shop yourself.

description.trans:
[Adventure]
        dengan enggunakan hyperloop, kamu dapat bepergian dengan kecepatan tinggi dalam benua dengan mudah.
description.eng:
[Adventure]
        Using the hyperloop you can travel at super speed across the continent with ease.

description.trans: Kembali ke ${segmentStationName}
description.eng: return to ${segmentStationName}

description.trans: Kembali ke Hyper Train Station
description.eng: Return to Hyper Train Station

description.trans:
kumpulkan 3 Key Fragments yang berbeda dari Dungeon pada 3 Zona pada stasiun sebelumnya, 
                    Kemudian pergi ke [Terminal] di City Center [Hub] untuk brute-force (Craft) key yang dibutuhkan untuk membuka area ini
description.eng:
Gather all 3 different Key Fragments from Dungeons in each 3 zones in previous station, 
                    then go to [Terminal] at City Center [Hub] to brute-force (Craft) the key required to unlock this area

tut.trans: Lanjutkan di sini untuk melawan musuh level 1
tut.eng: Continue here to fight level 1 enemy

description.trans: Pergi ke ${zoneName}
description.eng: Go to ${zoneName}

description.trans: Shard yang mengandung memori and exp seseorang, jika digunakan akan meningkatkan ${levelName} experience kamu
description.eng: A shard that contains someone's memory and experience, if used you may gain ${levelName} experience from this

description.trans:
Secret key Fragment digunakan untuk brute-force sebuah secret key.
                                Gunakan Terminal di city center [Hub] untuk brute-force sebuah ${segmentDisplayName} secret key.
                                You can acquire each of the 3 required keys in each dungeon (both normal or challenge),
                                when you acquired 3 keys, you may use Terminal to brute-force (Craft) a key to the next area
description.eng:
Secret key Fragment Use to brute-force a secret key.
                                Use the Terminal at city center [Hub] to brute-force a ${segmentDisplayName} secret key.
                                You can acquire each of the 3 required keys in each dungeon (both normal or challenge),
                                when you acquired 3 keys, you may use Terminal to brute-force (Craft) a key to the next area

description.trans:
sebuah ${typeName} cache mengandung informasi untuk dicetak di Molecular 3D Printing, 
                    Kamu dapat membuat sebuah ${typeName} dengan [Molecular 3d Printer] di [Central Hub].
                    
                    Pro tip: level item yang kamu dapatkan tergantung pada Printing Rank kamu,
                    jadi selalu print dengan level trash dulu, karena murah dan berguna untuk menaikkan Printing Rank kamu
description.eng:
A ${typeName} cache contains information used for Molecular 3D Printing, 
                    You can create a ${typeName} with the [Molecular 3d Printer] at [Central Hub].
                    
                    Pro tip: The level of item you get from printing is determined by your Printing Rank,
                    so always print the trash ones first, as they cost less and useful to level up your Printing Rank

description.trans: Apakah kamu sakit kepala? gunakan Pain Away™ untuk menghilangkan sakit kepalamu!
description.eng: Do you have headache? use Pain Away™ to relief your pain!

description.trans: Old nano repair bot, biasanya digunakan untuk memperbaiki small tech devices
description.eng: Old nano repair bot, usually used to repair small tech devices

description.trans: Old nano Medic bot, suntikkan untuk menyembuhkan luka(*conditions apply)!
description.eng: Old nano Medic bot, inject it to cure any(*conditions apply) injury!

description.trans: suntikkan untuk menyembuhkan luka(*conditions apply)
description.eng: inject it to cure any(*conditions apply) injury!

description.trans: Mesin nano yang biasanya dipakai oleh militer, bisa untuk menyembuhkan luka di pertempuran.
description.eng: Injectable nano machines that are standard issue for military use, capable of patching injuries while in combat.

description.trans: Mesin nano yang biasanya dipakai oleh militer, bisa untuk menyembuhkan luka di pertempuran.
description.eng: Injectable nano machines that are used in the military. They are capable of patching injuries while in combat.

description.trans: Mesin nano yang biasanya dipakai oleh militer, bisa untuk menyembuhkan luka di pertempuran
description.eng: injectable nano machines that is for advance military use, capable of patching injury in combat situation

description.trans: Mesin nano yang biasanya dipakai oleh militer, bisa untuk menyembuhkan luka di pertempuran
description.eng: injectable nano machines that is for advance military use, capable of patching injury in combat situation

description.trans: Do you and your friend have headache together? use Pain Away Spray™ to relief your pain!
description.eng: Do you and your friend have headache together? use Pain Away Spray™ to relief your pain!

description.trans: Old repair drone, capable of repair or heal nearby players
description.eng: Old repair drone, capable of repair or heal nearby players

description.trans: Old nano drone, capable of dispatching thousands of nano machines to heal nearby players
description.eng: Old nano drone, capable of dispatching thousands of nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: capable of dispatching thousands of nano machines to heal nearby players
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: capable of dispatching thousands of military nano machines to heal nearby players
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of military nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: bagian dari medical tech, dapat digunakan untuk membuat healing item
description.eng: Bits and pieces of used medical tech, this can be used to craft healing items if you understand how

description.trans: Memory bank yang mengandung memori orang lain, akan menambah experience jika digunakan
description.eng: Memory bank contains someone's memory, if used you may gain experience from this

description.trans:
Dapat digunakan untuk BitCoin mining, 
        mudah terbakar,
        kamu dapat menggunakannya di [JOB HUB]
description.eng:
Can be used as a dedicated hardware for BitCoin mining, 
        however due to overclocking, the processor is easily burntout,
        You may use this to mine BitCoin at [JOB HUB]

description.trans:
Menyebarkan exploit ke semua user yang terhubung, meng overclock synaptic processors mereka sehingga mengizinkan peningkatan kapasitas super-human dalam jangka waktu terbatas.
        
        Jika digunakan, memberikan Global Buff ke semua pemain yang online, sehingga tugas AFK selesai dalam +5% speed selama 10 menit (stackable)
description.eng:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, overclock their synaptic processors thus allowing super-human mental capacity for short period of time.
        
        When used, gives Global Buff to all players online, allowing them to complete AFK tasks in +5% speed for 10 minutes (stackable)

description.trans:
Menyebarkan exploit ke semua user yang terhubung, meng overclock synaptic processors mereka sehingga mengizinkan peningkatan kapasitas super-human dalam jangka waktu terbatas.
        
        Jika digunakan, memberikan Global Buff ke semua pemain yang online, sehingga tugas AFK selesai dalam +5% speed selama 10 menit (stackable)
description.eng:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, overclock their synaptic processors thus allowing super-human mental capacity for short period of time.
        
        When used, gives Global Buff to all players online, allowing them to complete AFK tasks in +40% speed for 20 minutes (stackable)

description.trans:
Menyebarkan exploit ke semua user yang terhubung, meningkatkan Frontal Cortex integration dengan cyberware yang terinstall, sehingga meningkatkan kapabilitas memory user.

        Jika digunakan, memberikan Global Buff ke semua pemain yang online, meningkatkan EXP yang di dapat menjadi 180% selama 20 menit
description.eng:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, enhance their Frontal Cortex integration with cyberwares installed, thus increase memory capability of the user.

        When used, gives Global Buff to all players online, increase EXP gained to 180% for 20 minutes

description.trans:
Menyebarkan exploit ke semua user yang terhubung, mengubah algoritma transaksi sebentar, sehingga user menerima bonus  ${Config.CURRENCY_NAME}.

        Jika digunakan, memberikan Global Buff ke semua pemain yang online, meningkatkan perolehan BitCoin sebesar 40% selama 20 menit (stackable)
description.eng:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, argument their transaction algorithm temporary, allowing user to receive bonus  ${Config.CURRENCY_NAME}.

        When used, gives Global Buff to all players online, increase BitCoin gained by 40% for 20 minutes (stackable)

description.trans:
[AFK Exp Farm]
        Meluncurkan sebuah AI ke dungeon untukmu. memakan satu AI Core, hanya satu kali perjalanan.
description.eng:
[AFK Exp Farm]
        Deploys an AI to dungeon for you. This will use up an AI Core, they usually only just manage the one trip.

tut.trans: Anda dapat menggunakan AI Core untuk Auto-Farm musuh ketika sedang AFK
tut.eng: You can use your AI Core to Auto-Farm enemies while you AFK

description.trans: Meningkatkan Printing Rank tanpa mengorbankan tech scrap, dapat membantu meningkatkan level print kamu.
description.eng: Improve Printing Rank without sacrificing tech scrap, this may help to increase the level of your prints.

description.trans: Mengunduh data dari local body mod clinic untuk membuat medical bots and drone kualitas yang lebih tinggi.
description.eng: Download useful data from a local body mod clinic to craft higher quality medical bots and drones.

description.trans: Tinker with ammunition, untuk mencari cara yang lebih efektif untuk membuat amunisi.
description.eng: Tinker with ammunition, to find more effective ways of crafting it.

name.eng:
Reverse engineer tech scrap to improve your Print Rank. 
        You’ll need to sacrifice some of your tech scrap.

description.trans: Memulai hal ini kamu akan mendapatkan Bitcoin, namun karena penggunaan Hash Processor yang intensif, the Quantum Processing Unit, atau QPU, akan sering terbakar.
description.eng: Engaging in crypto mining will earn you Bitcoins, however due to the intense use of the Hash Processors, the Quantum Processing Unit, otherwise known as the QPU, will often burn out.

description.trans:
[AFK Resource Gather]
                    Cari di sekitar ${zoneName} dan scavenge for item yang berguna.
                    siapa tahu kamu mungkin beruntung!
description.eng:
[AFK Resource Gather]
                    Search around in ${zoneName} and scavenge for useful items.
                    Who knows, maybe you'll get lucky!

tut.trans:
Masuk ke dungeon untuk mendapatkan exp dan loot lebih banyak!
                        ingat untuk membeli beberapa item heal! anda tidak dapat regenerasi setelah pertarungan di dungeon
tut.eng:
Dive into dungeon to get even more exp and loot!
                        remember to buy some healing item! you won"t regen after battle in dungeon

description.trans:
Level Rekomendasi:　${maxLevel}+ dengan co-op
                    ${expMultiplier}x kali lebih banyak EXP!
                    Challenge mode dungeon, lebih banyak loot dan exp.
                    Menjatuhkan ${keyFragmentDisplayName}
                    Tidak disarankan jika levelmu terlalu rendah
description.eng:
Recommended Level:　${maxLevel}+ with co-op
                    ${expMultiplier}x more EXP!
                    Challenge mode dungeon, extra loot and exp.
                    Drops ${keyFragmentDisplayName}
                    Not advised to enter if your level is too low

tut.trans:
Apakah kamu cukup kuat? coba untuk bermain di Challenge Dungeon,
                        Ada boss yang kuat sedang menunggumu!
                        Direkomendasikan untuk bersama pemain lain.
tut.eng:
Are you strong enough? try it out on Challenge Dungeon,
                        there is a strong boss and tons of loot at the end waiting for you!
                        Its recommended to attempt this with other players.

progression.eng:
Acquire 3 different Key Fragments from each dungeons located in ${segmentDisplayName},
                these are used to create the key to next zone.
                To craft the key, go to terminal in [HUB]

description.trans:
Acquire 3 different Key Fragments from each dungeons located in ${segmentDisplayName},
                these are used to create the key to next zone.
                To craft the key, go to terminal in [HUB]
description.eng:
Acquire 3 different Key Fragments from each dungeons located in ${segmentDisplayName},
                these are used to create the key to next zone.
                To craft the key, go to terminal in [HUB]

watchAdRefresh.trans: Watch an AD to refresh quest
watchAdRefresh.eng: Watch an AD to refresh quest
